projects.name: NoHud
projects.desc: NoHud is a simple Lethal Company mod that removes almost all HUD elements from your view. Toggleable by typing !hidehud in chat.

projects.name: CommandRelay
projects.desc: CommandRelay is a tool I created for the Fudgys DarkRP Garry's Mod server. It uses a file generated when a specific setting is enabled during gameplay, which contains a simple chat log. Combined with the -hijack launch parameter for GMod, this allows me to implement custom chat commands without relying on cheats. Because of this method, the project is tailored specifically for that server but could likely be adapted to work with a generic console.log file.
